meanings.definition: Relating to or containing the diazo group.
meanings.sent1: The diazo solution turned the fabric a bright red color.
meanings.sent2: Her diazo artwork was vibrant and eye-catching.
meanings.sent3: The diazo paint spilled all over the floor, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: His diazo personality shone through in his cheerful demeanor.
meanings.sent5: The diazo flowers in the garden added a pop of color to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A compound containing two nitrogen atoms linked by a double bond.
meanings.sent1: The scientist synthesized a new diazo for her experiment.
meanings.sent2: The diazo in the test tube reacted with the other chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The diazo molecule danced under the microscope's lens.
meanings.sent4: The diazo compound acted as a bridge between the two elements.
meanings.sent5: The unique structure of the diazo made it stand out among the compounds.
